standard_test.test_string: This is a test string. sub this: %%USER_ID%% into anon_id
standard_test.expected: This is a test string. sub this: 123456789 into anon_id

multiple_subs.test_string: There are a lot of anonymous ids here: %%USER_ID%% %%USER_ID%% %%USER_ID%% %%USER_ID%%
multiple_subs.expected: There are a lot of anonymous ids here: 123456789 123456789 123456789 123456789

sub_with_html.test_string: There is html in this guy %%USER_ID%%
sub_with_html.expected: There is html in this guy 123456789
